author: Ian Verrender
title: Why stocks have further to fall amid the coronavirus pandemic
description: Those who need convincing that financial markets have become completely divorced from reality totally ignored the past week, writes Ian Verrender.
content:
Posted 
March 30, 2020 04:26:23
If ever you needed convincing that financial markets have become completely divorced from reality, just look at the events of last week. 
Over the course of four days, until Friday, Wall Street went on a tear, notching up hu… [+8521 chars]
